title: Where the Sky Meets the Sea: Jennifer Guidi Leans Into Beauty
description: The artist’s new show at David Kordansky Gallery reveals her spiritual sensibility and inspires the pleasures of looking.
dc:creator: Robin Pogrebin
media:credit: Alex Welsh for The New York Times
media:description: Curators have increasingly come to recognize the depth and complexity of Jennifer Guidi’s art. “It’s more than it initially appears,” said one museum director.
